name: Real Crane Sand Excavator 3D
description:
Welcome to the Real Crane Sand Excavator 3D!
In this sand version of Tractor Simulator 3D you will learn how to drive with a tractor with trailer attached. You have to drive to the excavator and you have to wait until the excavator has loaded the trailer. You will learn step-by-step how to control the tractor and trailer properly. You will see that a trailer is a very important tool if you have to transport sand, you need it for example when you have to build a new stable, so you can transport the sand to somewhere else. You will face 15 exciting levels in a realistic construction environment. This sand version of Tractor Simulator 3D is special made for people who like farming, construction, or just like driving around in big machinery.
Real Crane Sand Excavator 3D Features.
Smooth Sand Excavator Operations.
User-friendly interface.
Change camera on touch movement.
Change The music through left write button.
its a paid game available on app store.
